Name: Linguistically annotated multilingual comparable corpora of parliamentary debates in English ParlaMint-en.ana 5.0
Description:
This corpus is the English machine translation of the ParlaMint.ana 5.0 (http://hdl.handle.net/11356/2005) set of corpora of parliamentary debates across Europe.
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository and for browsing through the noSketch Engine concordancer.
